cameraCapture.title: Camera Recording

cameraPreview.title: Recording Preview
cameraPreview.description: Review your recorded video before saving. After clicking the "Save Video" button, the file will be downloaded. Move it to the public/media folder of the project to add it to the timeline.

voiceRecord.permissionDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow access in browser settings.

voiceRecord.hint: Click the record button to start. The recording will be automatically added to the media library.
